name: ADVANCING MENTAL HEALTH FOR MILITARY FAMILIES, LLC
description: Organization that promotes support for veterans and their families' mental health
sampleDescriptions: Provide strategic counsel and advocacy for issues related to mental health care needs of Veterans, Active-Duty Service Members, National Guard, Reserves, and their families.
